about-opentutorials.desc-1: OTU is a knowledge sharing and note-taking service developed and operated by OpenTutorials.
about-opentutorials.desc-2: OpenTutorials, established on April 15, 2016, in Korea as a non-profit organization, aims to promote the free sharing of knowledge through technology. Our goal is to support mutual learning and growth under the slogan "What others can do, I can do too; what I can do, others can do too."
about-opentutorials.desc-3: Experts from various fields, especially software engineers, lead the development and operation of OpenTutorials' services. Our main services include the knowledge sharing platform <openTutorialsLink>opentutorials.org</openTutorialsLink> and the note-taking service <otuLink>OTU</otuLink>.
about-opentutorials.desc-4: As a non-profit organization, OpenTutorials has no shareholders, and surplus revenue, excluding operational costs, is reinvested in projects benefiting users and society. We promise never to sell our services or user data for profit.
about-opentutorials.title: About OpenTutorials

about-otu.desc-3: Put in more easily, take out more usefully. <newline></newline> <helpLink>View Help</helpLink>
about-otu.title: About OTU

ai-chatbot.desc: AI responds based on your records.
ai-chatbot.title: AI Chatbot

auto-title.desc: No more title worries, we generate them automatically.
auto-title.title: Automatic Title Generation

cross-platform.desc: Provides the same experience across various devices.
cross-platform.title: Cross-Platform Notepad

editing.desc: Supports advanced editing features at word processor level.
editing.title: Powerful Editing Features

ocr.desc: Extract text from images and save as notes.
ocr.title: OCR

quick-note.desc: Take notes instantly and get back to your routine.
quick-note.title: Quick Note-Taking

sample.title: Welcome! (OTU Sample Note)
sample.body:
This is a sample note from OTU. Feel free to delete it after reviewing.

 

Introducing OTU.

"The app's name is OTU. It's a note-taking app. Short for OpenTUtorials. It's a simple memo pad where you can freely store anything from diaries to manuscripts."

 

The theme we secretly hope you'll capture in this note is 'knowledge.'

  • Knowledge you don't have time to study now, but want to make yours someday.

  • Knowledge you don't need right now, but will need to revisit later.

 

Just toss those things into OTU, and we'll organize and store them for you.

 

  • If there are similar posts, we'll connect them.

  • We'll remind you of content you want to remember.

  • If there's no title, we'll create one for you.

  • If it's a photo, we'll analyze and describe the information in it.

  • If you ask via chat, we'll answer and search based on your records.

 

 

OTU Usage and Download

 

  • OTU GitHub Repository

  • iOS - App Store

  • Android - Google Play

 

If you have any questions or inquiries while using the app, please leave a message on GitHub Issues.

 

OpenTutorials

"OpenTutorials is a non-profit educational organization with the slogan 'What I can do, others can do; what others can do, I can do.'"
